skills.name: ENDLESS FEROCITY
desc: • Deals 3 hits of random damage to a single target.
• Grant an Extra Turn to a random ally.
• Damage dealt increases based on your SPECIAL stat.

skills.name: GATEKEEPER
desc: • Deal random damage to all enemies.
• Heal all allies based on your SPECIAL stat.
• Deal Additional Random Damage and Extend Negative Effect Duration by 1 for each Silver Effect removed.

skills.name: MASTER OF THE MAZE
desc: Steal all Beneficial Effects and inflict Seal, Silence, Blind, Perfect Disable, and Exhaust for 2 turns on a random enemy at the start of battle. Increase SPECIAL stat of all allies by 5% Every Turn.
